Name: Red Frozen
About the game: Have you ever wanted to see what Russia would look like if all the stereotypes about it were true? Red Frozen is a game that embodies all the stereotypes about Russia and even a little more. Only here you can ask a neighbor for a Kalashnikov assault rifle, go hunting with him and launch an intercontinental ballistic missile. Maximum Of Cranberries !!! Unique style of stereotypes and anecdotes about Russia; Nice graphics; Sophisticated shooting mechanics; Lots of Easter eggs; Possibility to play the balalaika![/] The action takes place in the village 'Vatnikovo'. A simple Russian peasant, Ivan, is being nailed by his wife, because by the age of 40 he had not tamed a bear. Help him in this difficult case! Drink vodka, play a balalaika and tame a real Russian bear! Even in summer it is cold enough in Russia, so do not forget to put on a quilted jacket and start a nuclear reactor so as not to freeze! The game is developed by 1.5 people (if you count by man-hours), or 3.25 (if you count by weight).
